Name: Pinga Ponga
About the game: Pinga Ponga is a improved Pong game with many extras and different game modes. Included are: -Many Levels -Different game modes (Classic, Destruction, Boss Fight and Long Level) -Controller support -AI -Accelerating ball -and much more Free game modes and levels comming soon! The Trading Cards comes in the next days!
